display_long_description:
Modes Included:

Single Player – Race through various tracks, compete against AI opponents, and master each stage at your own pace.

T.O.T. Championship – Take on the ultimate challenge in a tournament-style championship, racing across multiple tracks to claim victory.

Arcade Mode – Jump straight into the action with quick races across different tracks and themes.

Time Trial – Test your speed and skill by setting record lap times on each course. Compete against your best ghost or challenge others to beat your times.

4-Player Online Crazy Racing – Battle it out with up to four players online in fast-paced, chaotic races filled with intense competition, crazy jumps, and unexpected surprises.

Themed Racing Areas:

Rally Bump

Take on the rugged terrain in 11 unique on/off-road stages featuring dirt roads, forest trails.

Showtime

Prepare for over-the-top racing in 11 insane, high-speed Wipeout-style stages, filled with gravity-defying jumps, loops, and hazards that push racers to the limit.

Arctic Blast

Experience winter racing like never before with 6 snow and ice-covered tracks,  frozen lakes, and blizzards that test your control.

Desert Storm

Blaze through the sands in 5 high-speed desert tracks, featuring scorching sun, sand dunes, and treacherous dust storms that challenge visibility.
